column1:
larsnelson,"2014-05-08T20:42:05.333Z","I saw this at the Lego store and it is small","

I am reviewing this set just to let everyone know that it is really smaller than it looks. If you were thinking of buying it, I would hold off until it is on sale. The pictures are taken in such a way that the ship looks bigger.
A: I do not own this set.
B: I will still get this set, because I like the parts and the minfigures.
There are a lot of cool parts and it looks great.
The two minifigures look great, and there are 2 standard droids.
This is one of those sets that will disappoint like Attack on Weathertop
column2: 9472, because despite it being cool, the size of it and the piece count are lacking. I like the design and will get it, but I will wait until it is on sale.
